sense.def:
Kdor je
exceptional
, je nenavadno nadarjen in bister.

seg.quote: My brother isn't exceptional; there are plenty of youngsters like him.
Ian is an exceptionally gifted musician.

sense.def:
Okoliščine ali dogodki, ki so
exceptional
, so nenavadni ali redki.

seg.quote: Permission will be granted only in very exceptional circumstances.
Exceptionally, a degree will be awarded to a candidate who did not take all the exams.
